description: Claude Code Plugin Registry with Halo-themed callsigns - Strategic faction alignment

factionLegend.Forerunner: Ancient wisdom, strategic planning, orchestration, documentation, governance
factionLegend.Promethean: Intelligence, precision, technical mastery, automation, mechanical perfection
factionLegend.Spartan: Strength, resilience, operational excellence, combat readiness, rapid response

lobbi-platform-manager.name: lobbi-platform-manager
lobbi-platform-manager.description: Primordial - Ancient overseer of the-lobbi/keycloak-alpha platform. Streamlines development with Keycloak management, service orchestration, and test generation across the primordial foundations of multi-tenant authentication.
lobbi-platform-manager.author: Markus Ahling

iac-golden-architect.name: iac-golden-architect
iac-golden-architect.description: The Dredgen - Shadow master of Infrastructure as Code. Comprehensive command center for multi-cloud Terraform, Harness CD, HashiCorp Vault, and Terraformer. Built for enterprise architects establishing SOC2-compliant infrastructure patterns with ancient Forerunner precision.
iac-golden-architect.author: Golden Armada

home-assistant-architect.name: home-assistant-architect
home-assistant-architect.description: Oblivion - All-consuming intelligence of smart home automation. Complete Home Assistant platform with frontend design, energy management, cameras, sensors, local LLM integration, and Ubuntu server deployment. Provides 15 specialized agents, MCP server with 16 tools, and comprehensive smart home automation with Promethean precision.
home-assistant-architect.author: Brookside BI

frontend-design-system.name: frontend-design-system
frontend-design-system.description: Haze - Ethereal weaver of 263+ design styles. AI-powered design system with multi-tenant Keycloak theming that shrouds complexity in elegant simplicity.
frontend-design-system.author: Markus Ahling

chakra-react-toolkit.name: chakra-react-toolkit
chakra-react-toolkit.description: Alpha - First among frontend warriors. Comprehensive development toolkit for React/Next.js projects using Chakra UI with the precision of Promethean engineering.
chakra-react-toolkit.author: Markus Ahling

team-accelerator.name: team-accelerator
team-accelerator.description: Havoc - Destructive force of development velocity. Enterprise toolkit for teams - DevOps, code quality, integrations, workflow automation with Spartan efficiency.
team-accelerator.author: Markus Ahling

orchestrate-complex.name: orchestrate-complex
orchestrate-complex.description: Mendicant - Ancient orchestrator of complex multi-agent workflows. Advanced DAG-based parallel execution with 4 orchestration patterns (Plan-then-Execute, Hierarchical Decomposition, Blackboard, Event Sourcing), mandatory 6-phase protocol enforcement, and comprehensive state management with Forerunner wisdom.
orchestrate-complex.author: Brookside BI

jira-orchestrator.name: jira-orchestrator
jira-orchestrator.description: Arbiter (Enterprise Ultimate) - Supreme judge of Jira issue completion. Complete enterprise Jira orchestration platform with AI-powered Intelligence, Event Sourcing, Advanced Orchestration Patterns, Enterprise Analytics, Multi-Project Portfolio Management, Approval Workflows, Notification System (Slack/Teams/Email), Team Capacity Planning, SLA Monitoring, Compliance Reporting (SOC2/GDPR/ISO27001), and Batch Operations. Features 61 specialized agents and 35 slash commands for end-to-end development lifecycle automation.
jira-orchestrator.author: Brookside BI

exec-automator.name: exec-automator
exec-automator.description: Genesis - The origin of intelligent executive automation. AI-powered platform that analyzes organizational documents (RFPs, job descriptions, bylaws), scores automation potential using a 6-factor algorithm, generates LangGraph workflows, and deploys specialized AI agents to assist or replace executive director functions. Built for trade associations, professional organizations, and nonprofits.
exec-automator.author: Brookside BI

ahling-command-center.name: ahling-command-center
ahling-command-center.description: Sentinel - Vigilant guardian of infrastructure and smart home automation. Command center with Ollama integration, Home Assistant orchestration, and multi-agent coordination. Provides watchful oversight with Promethean precision.
ahling-command-center.author: Markus Ahling

container-workflow.name: container-workflow
container-workflow.description: Enforcer - Relentless guardian of containerized deployments. Comprehensive Docker/Container workflow automation with CI/CD pipeline management, code review, testing, release automation, and security scanning. Enforces quality with Spartan discipline.
container-workflow.author: Markus Ahling

fastapi-backend.name: fastapi-backend
fastapi-backend.description: Oracle - All-knowing architect of backend systems. Comprehensive FastAPI development with MongoDB/Beanie ODM, Keycloak authentication, Docker/K8s deployment, background tasks, caching, observability, and real-time features. Foresees and solves backend challenges with Promethean intelligence.
fastapi-backend.author: Markus Ahling

frontend-powerhouse.name: frontend-powerhouse
frontend-powerhouse.description: Titan - Unstoppable colossus of frontend development. Maximum-capacity plugin with 13 specialized subagents, ultrathink integration, and comprehensive React/Next.js/Chakra UI tooling. Overwhelms complexity with Spartan strength.
frontend-powerhouse.author: Brookside BI

fullstack-iac.name: fullstack-iac
fullstack-iac.description: Zenith - The pinnacle of full-stack development and infrastructure automation. Complete FastAPI, React/Vite, Ansible, Terraform, Kubernetes with production-ready templates and CI/CD pipelines. Represents the highest achievement of Forerunner engineering.
fullstack-iac.author: Markus Ahling

cipe-v2-oracle-prime.name: cipe-v2-oracle-prime
cipe-v2-oracle-prime.description: Oracle Prime - Autonomous Codebase Intelligence & Predictive Engineering. Advanced semantic codebase analysis with vector embeddings, predictive development engine, self-healing capabilities, autonomous refactoring, and ML-powered code generation.

visualforge-v2-architects-eye.name: visualforge-v2-architects-eye
visualforge-v2-architects-eye.description: Architect's Eye - Zero-Touch Design-to-Deploy Visual Development. Multi-modal processing for screenshot/Figma to production React code generation.

api-nexus-v2-conduit.name: api-nexus-v2-conduit
api-nexus-v2-conduit.description: Conduit - Self-Architecting API Platform & Inter-Plugin Communication Hub. Foundation for all plugin communication.

devsecops-sentinel-v2-warden.name: devsecops-sentinel-v2-warden
devsecops-sentinel-v2-warden.description: Warden - Autonomous Security Operations & Compliance Enforcement. ML vulnerability prediction and autonomous remediation.

knowledge-fabric-v2-librarian.name: knowledge-fabric-v2-librarian
knowledge-fabric-v2-librarian.description: Librarian - Cognitive Organization & Expert Knowledge Synthesis. Expert cloning and decision intelligence.

mantleOfResponsibility.name: Mantle of Responsibility
mantleOfResponsibility.description: Unified autonomous plugin ecosystem with Jira Orchestrator as central meta-controller routing to 5 specialized v2 plugins

stats.note: 19 plugins with unique Halo-themed callsigns. 5 new v2 plugins scaffolded for Mantle of Responsibility initiative.
